showcase_test.title: Athenaeum
showcase_test.description: Athenaeum is a rougelike deckbuilder where you venture through a mysterious library battling cultists and collecting cards.

showcase_test.title: Patrick's Parabox
showcase_test.description: Patrick’s Parabox is an award-winning puzzle game about playing with recursion and infinities by pushing boxes into and out of each other.

showcase_test.title: Contract Killer
showcase_test.description: Contract Killer is a 2.5D co-op beat ‘em up starring a diverse cast of angry writing utensils. Punch, snap, and clap your way through baddies and bosses in a comical campaign, clash against your friends, or survive endless swarms of corporate goons!
showcase_test.credits: Alex Garza, Aiden Jauffret, Matthew Lawrence, and Leon Yang

showcase_test.title: Bedtime Beats
showcase_test.description: You're a kid playing a rhythm game past your bedtime, try not to get caught!
showcase_test.credits: Art: Erin, Programming: Din & Jonathan, Audio: Bree & Breanna

showcase_test.title: Gravitas
showcase_test.description: Pixel-style Tower Defense Game with Gravity Mechanics
showcase_test.credits: Programming, Art, Music: Yukun Li, Xinkai Wu, Script, Music: Xingyan Liu
